name: Taxonomy Manager
author: Pranav Rastogi

sections.description:
Manage taxonomies from WordPress back-end. Add/Edit/Delete taxonomies and more!

Features:

  • Create taxonomies.
  • Delete taxonomies.
  • Edit taxonomies.
  • Add taxonomies for custom post types.
  • Add taxonomies for pages and links.
  • Widget to display terms of a taxonomy as a tag cloud or list.

More features in future versions.

Usage

Taxonomy Manager – Usage
sections.installation:
1. Unzip taxonomy-manager.zip in ‘wp-content/plugins’.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq: Taxonomy Manager
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fixed a bug which prevented activation on some blogs.

1.0.0

  • Plugin is ready for the world.

short_description: Add, Edit, Delete & Manage taxonomies for posts, pages, links and custom post types with a few clicks of mouse. Makes adding taxonomies a 100 time …
